definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: With softness and strength, i would like to make more friends.
sentences.chinese: 我剛柔並濟，活潑大方，願意結交更多的朋友。

sentences.english: This is a kind of flexible management mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種剛柔並濟的靈活性的管理機制。

sentences.english: The usage of the steel and wood gives the feeling of hard and soft.
sentences.chinese: 鋼鐵和木材的使用將剛柔並濟的感覺結合起來。

definition: properly/satisfactorily/firmly/very fitting/appropriate/proper/to be in good order/also written 妥帖
lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom)/fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
to blend into one another/to blend together well
to return to one's true self/to regain the natural state
lit. moving clouds and flowing water (idiom)/fig. very natural and flowing style of calligraphy, writing, etc/natural and unforced
